```{r}
# 1-Basic Statistics
outlier <- function(x){
scope1 <- quantile(x, c(0.25))
scope2 <- quantile(x, c(0.75))
for(k in 1:length(x)){
outlier <- x[k]>(1.5*(scope2-scope1))
return(outlier)}
}
```
```{r}
digitToWord<- function(x,y){
x[k] <- 0 
for(k in 1:length(x)) {
x[k] = y[k]
}
return(x[k])
}
```
```{r}
lettersMatch <- function(words, pattern){
Match <- grepl("^pattern$",words)
return(Match)
}
```
```{r}
piSeries <- function(n){
num <- -1^n  
denom <- seq(1,10,by=2)
return(4*sum((num/denom)))
}
```
